charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1101_010:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
through the town square, two(?) Pikachu
appeared!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_030: OK! Can you tell which of us is the real one?
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_0401_050: Eh heh heh! Nope, too bad! This one’s ME!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_0402_070:
Oh no! You saw through my disguise! You’re
pretty good!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_080:
Seeing your reaction, I feel like I’ve gotten just a
little closer to looking like Pikachu!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_090:
Which is great, because my dream in life is...to
become a Pikachu!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_100:
That’s why every day, I’m always watching how
Pikachu moves...
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_110:
I’ve been doing this for-EVER, but there’s still so
much I don’t get!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_0301_120:
Even though Pikachu are all over
the world?
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_0401_130:
But doesn’t that make you wonder why there are
Pikachu in so many different regions?
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_0302_140: Aren’t there details in the Pokédex?
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_0402_150:
Of course I’ve read all that, but it doesn’t answer
all my “why?” questions!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_0402_160:
Like, why do the males and females have
different-looking tails?
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_170:
And there are lots of other mysteries about
Pikachu, too!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_0401_190: I know, right?! Pikachu’s the BEST Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_0402_210:
Well, y’know...that’s ’cause we’re talking about
Pikachu, my favorite!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_220:
And when you think of Pikachu...you think of
electricity, right?
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_230:
I know it’s stored in the electric sacs on Pikachu’s
cheeks, but it sure is mysterious!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_240: So, yeah. Pokémon are really deep.
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_250: I wish I could solve just one of those mysteries...
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_0301_260:
Are you gonna become a
Pokémon Professor?
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_0401_270:
Ooh! I hadn’t thought of that, but that’s a good
idea!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_0402_290:
Yeah! Maybe I’ll even try to become a Pokémon
professor!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_300:
Thanks to you, my future looks as bright as a
thunderbolt!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_310: But before I start studying other Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_320:
I wanna learn more and more and MORE about
Pikachu!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_330:
I mean, what’s the point of all this if I don’t even
know my own partner?!
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_340: Hee hee! The next time I see you...
charaepi_ch0657_00_chusuke/2301_1201_350:
I’ll be so close to the real deal, you might not be
able to tell the difference!
